definition: to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

sentences.english: 's point-guard corps. Tim Duncan's inside-outside game effectively puts Bynum on the bench.
sentences.chinese: 鄧肯在比賽中的巨大效用會把安豬牢牢地按在板凳上。

sentences.english: Room Service. Whfor can I do for you?
sentences.chinese: 客房任事部，能爲您效用嗎？

sentences.english: The concept of index utility and its mensuration is built up.
sentences.chinese: 提出了指數效用論觀點和測度方法。

sentences.english: Most are variants of what is described in academia as "multi-attribute utility analysis."
sentences.chinese: 大多數是變體在學術界認爲“多屬性效用分析。”

sentences.english: This diet pill is ineffective , I'm still as fat as a piggy!
sentences.chinese: 這種減肥藥沒有效用，我仍舊肥得像只豬。

sentences.english: Stillness has a calming effect on the world around us as well.
sentences.chinese: 在這個世界上，在我們周圍，靜有一種鎮靜的效用。

sentences.english: This sort of dietetic food has the effect of nourishing the human Body.
sentences.chinese: 這種食療食品有滋補營養的效用。

sentences.english: The effects of oxytocin nasal spray are not limited to those with autism either.
sentences.chinese: 催生素鼻噴霧劑的效用不僅僅限於自閉症。

sentences.english: With utility computing, software-as-a-service models become possible.
sentences.chinese: 使用效用計算，使得“軟件即服務”的模型成爲可能。

sentences.english: Quinacrine has shown some efficacy in animals.
sentences.chinese: 奎納克林已在動物身上顯現某些效用。

sentences.english: The owner maximizes his expected utility under the two constraints.
sentences.chinese: 企業主在兩個約束下最大化其預期效用。

sentences.english: Find out more about how sketching is used in the design process within multiple design disciplines.
sentences.chinese: 我們來看一看草圖是如何在各種設計中發揮效用的？

sentences.english: What did he mean by utility?
The proposed scheme has the lower handover call probability at the cost of little utility.
sentences.chinese: 該策略以少量的效用代價換取較低的切換掉話率。

sentences.english: There are many different ball games that can do this for us.
sentences.chinese: 有很多種不同的球類運動有此效用。

sentences.english: How Often Do Sensitivity Analyses for Economic Parameters Change Cost-Utility Analysis Conclusions ?
sentences.chinese: 經濟參數敏感性分析改變成本效用分析結論的頻率？

definition: to act on/to affect/action/function/activity/impact/result/effect/purpose/intent/to play a role/corresponds to English -ity, -ism, -ization/CL:個|个[ge4]
to have an effect/to play a role/to be operative/to work/to function
to display/to exhibit/to bring out implicit or innate qualities/to express (a thought or moral)/to develop (an idea)/to elaborate (on a theme)
